flawed_nl_solution:
Her friends will eat 16 slices of cake because 8 x 2 = <<8*2=16>>16
There will be 19 slices eaten in total because 16 + 3 = <<16+3=19>>19
She is making 42 slices of cake because 4 x 6 = <<4*6=42>>42
There will be 23 pieces left over because 42 - 19 = <<42-19=23>>23
#### 23

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 24, not 42. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
